actions.text: Motion to proceed to consider tabled in Senate, roll call #156 (47-40).
Place on calendar in Senate under Subjects on the Table.

official_title: A Senate Joint Resolution relating to the Constitutional Amendment on abortion.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that with respect to the right to life guaranteed in the Constitution, every human being, subject to the jurisdiction of the United States, or of any State, shall be deemed, from the moment of fertilization, to be a person and entitled to the right to life.

titles.title: A Senate Joint Resolution relating to the Constitutional Amendment on abortion.
